description:
A basic 101 for English writing.

Not useful for professional writers.

Covers following topics:

Introduction to the English Writing,
Writing Systems,
Effective Writing,
Writing process,
Grammar and writing,
Resume writing,
Scientific writing,
Writing effective summary,
Writing emails,
Writing proposals,
Writing business plan.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
